description.value: Gain one random Heirloom item from noted list or +3 Toughness. Hierloom, Roll 1d100, gain Hierloom. 01-20: Best Archeotech Laspistol, 21-40: Best Chainsword, 41-60: Ancestral Seal, +10 to Interaction Tests with Imperial Citizens whilst Displayed, 61-80: Best Carapace Armour, 81-00: Reliquary of Saint Drusus: +20 to Interaction Tests with Ministorum Members whilst Displayed

system.effectText: Gain one random Heirloom item from noted list or +3 Toughness. Hierloom, Roll 1d100, gain Hierloom. 01-20: Best Archeotech Laspistol, 21-40: Best Chainsword, 41-60: Ancestral Seal, +10 to Interaction Tests with Imperial Citizens whilst Displayed, 61-80: Best Carapace Armour, 81-00: Reliquary of Saint Drusus: +20 to Interaction Tests with Ministorum Members whilst Displayed
